belongs_to_collection.name: Mingo y Aníbal, dos pelotazos en contra

original_title: Mingo y Aníbal contra los fantasmas
overview: Mingo and Aníbal are two friends who work at a car dealership and are accused of a murder they did not commit. The incident occurred in a remote house, where both friends go to try to hide and solve the crime. There they will try to elude a ghost that wanders in the place while trying to regain their innocence.
title: Mingo y Aníbal contra los fantasmas
